Details: Researched and profiled ideal seller segments. Included small retailers, individuals, and importers.
Created guides and tutorials for new sellers. Included video walkthroughs and FAQ.
Running campaigns to attract sellers to the platform. Using social media, direct outreach, and referral incentives.
Set up support channels for onboarding questions. Use email, chat, and phone support.
Track seller activity and feedback for improvements. Analyze drop-off points in onboarding.
Survey new sellers about their onboarding experience.
